msbt.message: I learn so much from seeing how someone else decorates their home.I love the creative use of space in here. It's giving me some decorating ideas of my own,

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your bed looks like it must be a really comfortable place to sleep!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I've read we spend almost a third of our lives sleeping, so I'd say where we sleep is very important.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I have friends that leave the TV on all day because they feel less lonely with voices in their homes. I only ever turn my TV on to hear the weather report. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Do you think I've missed out on anything?

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />You must be a real audiophile. Look at your !I've read that anyone who's really into their sound system can hear things that most don't in music. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Do you really hear things in your music that I'm not hearing?

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Oh, look at that. It's right now.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Clocks can make a design statement when you're decorating your home, but also help you manage your time.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Adding even just one plant to a room makes it feel more alive.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I think having one in your home makes the air smell fresher too.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Wow, I wasn't expecting your tub to be soso clean! I'm sorry, that came out kind of wrong <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I'm not surprised that you keep a clean tub. It's just that seeing this makes me want to go scrub mine.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Furnishings can make a statement whether they fill a room or not.You've made a statement here with your <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />And, uh, I hear you loud and clear!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />So am I looking at your favorite ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />If I am, I guess this is sort of like your throne room, !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />So, do you actually play your ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Wish I could offer to play with you, but I'm really out of practice

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Do you like to cook? My dad takes a lot of pride in his cooking, so I feel closer to him when I'm making meals.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Sorry for getting all sentimental I just like to hope I take after him.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />So, I can't help noticing your <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />, are you athletic?I'm just curious to see if my intuition is right about you being into sports.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Putting outdoor furniture like this inside is a fun decorating choice. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I think you're really creative!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />The lighting effect coming from your <20_3 arg="3" /> is so elegant, . <20_3 arg="6" />Lighting plays such a pivotal role in good interior design.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />No home is complete without .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />You could have a fresh look every day if you wanted to, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your must be handy for storing things.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I know some folks say out of sight, out of mind, but proper storage is absolutely necessary. It's easy to keep track of your items if you maintain and update a spreadsheet to catalog them.
